    • getInstance

    • destroy

      public static LeaderCardsController destroy()

    • activateSpecialAbility

      public void activateSpecialAbility​(ClientActivateSpecialAbilityMessage action, RemoteViewHandler view, User user)
      Called when the player is attempting to activate a Leader Card special ability.
      Parameters:
      action - the ClientMessage containing information about the player's action.
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.

    • throwLeaderCard

      public void throwLeaderCard​(ClientThrowLeaderCardMessage action, RemoteViewHandler view, User user) throws EndOfGameException
      Called when the player is discarding a leader card from their hand.
      Parameters:
      action - the ClientMessage containing information about the player's action.
      view - the player's corresponding RealRemoteViewHandler that will handle status messages to be sent back to the view.
      user - the User corresponding to the player making the action.
      Throws:
      EndOfGameException

    • checkRequirements

      private boolean checkRequirements​(Player player, LeaderCard targetCard)
      This method is called whenever a player tries to activate a leaderCard
      Parameters:
      player - Player whose leader card is being played.
      targetCard - LeaderCard being played.
      Returns:
      true if card can be played, false otherwise.

    • useAbility

      private void useAbility​(Player player, LeaderCard targetCard)
      Called when the activation of a leader card is confirmed so that its special ability is implemented.
      Parameters:
      player - player activating the card.
      targetCard - card being activated.
